thread.section_title: GlobeNewswire: Industry News on Specialty Finance
thread.title: PRA Group to Announce Second Quarter 2015 Results on August 10
thread.title_full: PRA Group to Announce Second Quarter 2015 Results on August 10

title: PRA Group to Announce Second Quarter 2015 Results on August 10
text:
PRA Group to Announce Second Quarter 2015 Results on August 10 August 04, 2015 14:04 ET | Source: PRA Group 
NORFOLK, Va., Aug. 4, 2015 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- PRA Group (Nasdaq: PRAA ), a global leader in acquiring non-performing loans, will announce its second quarter 2015 results after market close on Monday, August 10, 2015, followed by a webcast and conference call at 5:00 p.m. ET. 
To listen to PRA Group's webcast, visit http://ir.PRAgroup.com/events.cfm . To listen by phone on August 10, call 888-695-7639 in the U.S. or 970-315-0482 outside the U.S. The conference ID is 95571605. A question-and-answer session on the call will be open only to institutional investors and stock analysts. To listen to a replay of the call until August 16, 2015, call 855-859-2056 in the U.S. or 404-537-3406 outside the U.S. and use conference ID 95571605. 
About PRA Group 
As a global leader in acquiring non-performing loans, PRA Group returns capital to global banks and other creditors to help expand financial services for consumers in North America and Europe. PRA Group companies collaborate with customers to help them resolve their debt and provide a broad range of additional revenue and recovery services to business and government clients. 
PRA has been recognized as one of Fortune's 100 Fastest-Growing Companies for the past three years and one of Forbes' Best Small Companies in America for eight consecutive years since 2007. For more information, please visit www.pragroup.com . Investor Contact: Darby Schoenfeld Director of Investor Relations (757) 431-7913 Media Contact: Nancy Porter Vice President, Corporate Communications (757) 431-7950 Related Articles
